title: Textile, 1920–30
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: block print on plain weave
description: Polychrome block print on natural linen. Rows of serpentine vines with green leaves, purple, red, blue and red flowers. Alternate rows of red ribbon with either side in green scallops.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920–30.
1920–30. Medium: linen
Technique: block print on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-62.
